*Setting:* Byui.edu (laptop) in the cross-roads looking for a tutor for the first time

*Actors:* Susan is a freshman 

*Event:* 

# Immediately following his first Discrete math class
# She Googles for TutorTrac and finds it.
# She looks around the page and finds the way to start finding tutors
# She selects which class she wants to get a tutor for
# She navigates the calender to see which time she can do
# She selects a time at 3pm
# She selects a tutor available for that time
# She looks at the profile for the tutor and decides they look good
# She enters a reason for her appointment
# She hits "submit"
